GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves the comments on an article

exampleResponse.comment_id: a unique identifier for the comment
exampleResponse.article_id: a unique identifier for the parent article
exampleResponse.author: the username of the author
exampleResponse.votes: the number of votes on the comments

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: post a comment to an article

exampleResponse.article_id: a unique identifier for the parent article
exampleResponse.author: the username of the commenter
exampleResponse.body: a unique identifier for the parent article
exampleResponse.comment_id: a unique identifier for the comment
exampleResponse.votes: the number of votes on the comments
